physics.energy_mechanics: Designed to respond, not initiate. Sacral responds with 'uh-huh' (yes) or 'uhn-uhn' (no)

strategy.name: To Respond
strategy.description: Wait for something external to respond to before taking action
strategy.mechanics: The Sacral makes sounds in response to yes/no questions or external stimuli. Pure Generators should not initiate - they should wait for life to come to them and then respond from the Sacral.
examples: Someone asks if you want coffee - respond from gut, not mind
See job posting - notice Sacral response before applying
Friend suggests activity - check Sacral before agreeing

signature.name: Satisfaction
signature.description: When living correctly, Generators experience deep satisfaction in their work and life

not_self_theme.name: Frustration
not_self_theme.description: When not following Strategy, Generators become frustrated
causes: Saying yes with the mind instead of the Sacral
Taking on work that isn't theirs to do

failure_states.correction: Stop initiating. Practice responding to yes/no questions. Notice Sacral sounds.
failure_states.experiment: For 7 days, don't initiate anything. Only respond. Journal frustration levels.

failure_states.diagnosis: Overriding Sacral no, taking on too much
failure_states.correction: Honor every Sacral no. Release commitments that drain life force.
failure_states.experiment: Quit one thing that generates Sacral 'no'. Notice energy return.

failure_states.diagnosis: Saying yes when Sacral says no (people-pleasing)
failure_states.correction: Practice saying no when Sacral indicates no. Release guilt.
failure_states.experiment: Say no to 3 things this week that Sacral indicates no to. Track resentment.

with_generator.dynamics: Two responsive beings. Both need to wait to respond. Can create powerful work together.
with_generator.friction_points: Both waiting for the other to initiate. Stagnation if neither responds.
with_generator.harmony_keys: Take turns initiating questions for each other. Create response opportunities.

with_manifestor.dynamics: Manifestor initiates, Generator responds. Natural complementary dance.
with_manifestor.friction_points: Generator frustrated by Manifestor's independence. Manifestor controlled by Generator's response needs.
with_manifestor.harmony_keys: Manifestor: inform before acting. Generator: give clear yes/no responses.

with_projector.dynamics: Generator does the work, Projector guides. Powerful when Generator invites Projector's guidance.
with_projector.friction_points: Projector giving unsolicited advice. Generator not recognizing Projector's wisdom.
with_projector.harmony_keys: Generator: invite Projector's input. Projector: wait for invitation before guiding.

with_reflector.dynamics: Generator provides consistency, Reflector mirrors environment. Reflector helps Generator see blind spots.
with_reflector.friction_points: Generator impatient with Reflector's need for time. Reflector overwhelmed by Generator's intensity.
with_reflector.harmony_keys: Generator: give Reflector space and time. Reflector: appreciate Generator's consistent energy.

with_manifesting_generator.dynamics: Similar but MG moves faster. Pure Generator provides steady pace, MG provides multi-tasking inspiration.
with_manifesting_generator.friction_points: MG's speed frustrates pure Generator. Generator's pace bores MG.
with_manifesting_generator.harmony_keys: Respect different paces. MG can skip steps, Generator needs process.

career_alignment.ideal_work: Work that generates genuine Sacral response, sustainable over time
signs_of_right_work: Feel satisfied at end of day
Natural 'uh-huh' response when asked if you love the work
signs_of_wrong_work: Sacral says 'no' but mind keeps you there

rest_requirements.sleep: Generators need to discharge Sacral energy before sleep. Physical activity, sex, or energetic release before bed.
rest_requirements.burnout_prevention: Honor Sacral no. Don't take on work that doesn't generate genuine response.
rest_requirements.restoration: Sacral energy renews through proper use and discharge, not through rest alone.

communication_style.speaking: Respond to questions. Use yes/no questions to clarify decisions.
communication_style.listening: Listen to own Sacral sounds. 'Uh-huh' = yes, 'uhn-uhn' = no
communication_style.decision_making: Ask yes/no questions, respond with Sacral. Not mental. Gut knows immediately.

conflict_resolution.pattern: Generator frustration escalates into anger if suppressed
conflict_resolution.healthy_approach: Express frustration early. Use physical activity to discharge. Return to responding.
conflict_resolution.unhealthy_pattern: Suppress frustration, become resentful, explode eventually

core_wound.description: Being told to initiate, to 'make things happen', to not wait
core_wound.conditioning: Modern culture tells Generators they're passive if they wait. Shames responding as weak.
core_wound.healing: Recognize that responding is power. The entire world needs Generator energy. Waiting magnetizes correct opportunities.

healing_modality.primary: Physical movement and work that generates Sacral response
practices: Work on projects that light up Sacral

spiritual_pathway.essence: Mastery through right work. Generators are here to master their craft through response.
spiritual_pathway.transcendence: When Generator does right work, they become the work itself. No separation.
